entry.title: Karabakh families receive first housing subsidies

media:group.media:title: Karabakh families receive first housing subsidies
media:group.media:description:
üìç Armenia will issue additional zero customs tax quotas for electric vehicle imports. üìç A total of 990 Nagorno-Karabakh families have submitted applications to take part in the program that provides housing subsidies for the refugees in Armenia, although only 30 of those applications have been approved so far. üìç Make Azerbaijan Release Its Political Prisoners: civilnet.am/en/news/800400/make-azerbaijan-release-its-political-prisoners

media:group.media:title: –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏—è –∏ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ—Ä
media:group.media:description:
–ó—É—Ä–∞–± –ê–±–∞—à–∏–¥–∑–µ, –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–π –≥—Ä—É–∑–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π –¥–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞—Ç –∏ —É—á–µ–Ω—ã–π –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏–ª —Å –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–æ–º –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–º—É ‚Äú–†–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –¥–ª—è –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–∏‚Äù –Ω–∞ —Å–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º–µ, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º –ú–æ–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ–π—Å–∫–æ–π –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞—Ç–∏–≤–æ–π –ø–æ –∏–∑—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—é –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –≤ –ò–Ω—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—É—Ç–µ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –ú–∏–¥–¥–ª–±–µ—Ä–∏ –≤ –ú–æ–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ–µ. –õ–µ–∫—Ü–∏—è —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–ª–∞—Å—å 8 –∏—é–ª—è –≤ –¢–±–∏–ª–∏—Å–∏.
–ó—É—Ä–∞–± –ê–±–∞—à–∏–¥–∑–µ ‚Äì –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –¥–∏–ø–ª–æ–º–∞—Ç. –û–Ω –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª –ø–æ—Å—Ç –∑–∞–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞ –∏–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–µ–ª –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–∏ –∏ –±—ã–ª –ø–æ—Å–ª–æ–º –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–∏ –≤ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö –ë–µ–Ω–∏–ª—é–∫—Å–∞ (1993-2000), –≥–ª–∞–≤–æ–π –º–∏—Å—Å–∏–∏ –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –ù–ê–¢–û (1994-2000) –∏ –ø–æ—Å–ª–æ–º –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ (2000-2004). –í 2012 –≥–æ–¥—É –æ–Ω –±—ã–ª –Ω–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–º—å–µ—Ä-–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞ –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–∏ –ø–æ —Å–≤—è–∑—è–º —Å –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–π –§–µ–¥–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π. –° 2006 –≥–æ–¥–∞ –æ–Ω —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≥–ª–∞–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∞ "–ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–Ω—Å–∫–æ–π —ç–Ω—Ü–∏–∫–ª–æ–ø–µ–¥–∏–∏". –ê–±–∞—à–∏–¥–∑–µ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–∏—Ö –∫–Ω–∏–≥, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ "–ù–ê–¢–û –≤ –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–∏: –æ—Ç —É—Ç–æ–ø–∏–∏ –∫ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏" (NATO in Georgia: From Utopia Towards Reality), "–•–æ–ª–æ–¥–Ω–∞—è –≤–æ–π–Ω–∞: –ø—Ä–æ—à–ª–æ–µ –∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–æ—è—â–µ–µ?" (The Cold War: Past or Present?) –∏ "–í —Ç–µ–Ω–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä—É—à–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç–µ–Ω—ã" (In the Shadow of a Demolished Wall).
–ù–∞ –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–µ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏–ª —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –ê–Ω–∞—Ç–æ–ª—å –õ–∏–≤–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–º—É ‚Äú–°—É–¥—å–±–∞ –º–∞–ª—ã—Ö –Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤: –Ω–æ–≤–∞—è –≥–µ–æ–ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –Æ–∂–Ω–æ–º –ö–∞–≤–∫–∞–∑–µ –∏ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–µ–π‚Äù (The Fate of Small Nations: Emerging Geopolitics in South Caucasus and Relations with Russia).
–ê–Ω–∞—Ç–æ–ª—å –õ–∏–≤–µ–Ω ‚Äî –±—Ä–∏—Ç–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥, –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å, –∂—É—Ä–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç, –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∫. –û–Ω –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä –ö–µ–º–±—Ä–∏–¥–∂—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–∞ –∏ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏–π –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω—ã–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫ –ò–Ω—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—É—Ç–∞ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –ö—É–∏–Ω—Å–∏ –≤ –í–∞—à–∏–Ω–≥—Ç–æ–Ω–µ (Quincy Institute).
–í —ç—Ç–æ–º –≥–æ–¥—É –ª–µ—Ç–Ω–∏–π –ú–æ–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ–π—Å–∫–∏–π —Å–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º –ø–æ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∏–ª –≤ –ï—Ä–µ–≤–∞–Ω–µ, –¢–±–∏–ª–∏—Å–∏ –∏ –°—Ç–∞–º–±—É–ª–µ —Å 1 –ø–æ 20 –∏—é–ª—è.

entry.title: Scylla's founder on Armenia's tech tipping point

media:group.media:title: Scylla's founder on Armenia's tech tipping point
media:group.media:description:
In this eye-opening interview, Albert Stepanyan, founder of Scylla, offers a candid and insightful look into Armenia's emerging role as a high-tech powerhouse. Stepanyan delves into the country's unique advantages, from its rich pool of talent to its distinctive work culture, while also addressing critical vulnerabilities such as supply chain issues that could impact Armenia's tech aspirations.

entry.title: Nation-states, Nation-people, and the need to protect the safety of Armenia #shorts

media:group.media:title: Nation-states, Nation-people, and the need to protect the safety of Armenia #shorts
media:group.media:description:
In today's segment of Mindful Leaders, we speak with Dr. Noubar Afeyan and Dr. Eric Esrailian. Noubar Afeyan, founder and CEO of Flagship Pioneering, is also a co-founder and Board Chairman of Moderna. His journey from Armenian parents in Lebanon to becoming a leading figure in biomedicine is a testament to resilience and determination. Afeyan has co-founded several therapeutics and biomedicinal companies, holds over a hundred patents, and initiated various philanthropic projects, including the Aurora Humanitarian Initiative, FAST Foundation, and the UWC Dilijan School.

entry.title: Russian border guards to withdraw from Armenia‚ÄìIran checkpoint

media:group.media:title: Russian border guards to withdraw from Armenia‚ÄìIran checkpoint
media:group.media:description:
üìç Armenian Border Guard troops will be guarding the Armenia-Iran and Armenia-Turkey borders together with the Russian border guards starting January 1. üìç Russia‚Äôs deputy prime minister Alexey Overchuk asserted yesterday that the unblocking of economic and transport links in the South Caucasus is only possible with Russia's participation. üìç Armenia is set to register its signature specialties ‚Äî lavash, basturma, sujuk, and matzoon ‚Äî as geographical indications. üìç Armenia‚Äôs high-tech ambitions in a turbulent world: youtu.be/Wc1z7zgjyWI

media:group.media:title: Reinventing Yerevan through technology
media:group.media:description:
In this interview, Hazem Galal, PwC's global leader on Smart Cities and AI, shares his expertise on how Yerevan can harness cutting-edge technologies to transform into a more liveable, efficient, and sustainable urban center. This conversation provides a compelling vision of Yerevan's potential future, where ancient history and modern innovation converge to create a city that's not just smart, but also deeply attuned to the needs of its citizens.

entry.title: How to foster and keep Armenian startups

media:group.media:title: How to foster and keep Armenian startups
media:group.media:description:
In this candid conversation, Artur Karapetyan, founder of the fintech startup Text'n Pay Me, offers a ground-level view of Armenia's burgeoning startup ecosystem. Karapetyan shares his experiences building a tech company in Armenia, comparing the country's approach to fostering startups with neighboring Georgia.
